title: New key fragments not dropping
body:
ok so its been a few days since the new honor system came out i have enjoyed it and played a decent amount been honored (tho i know keys are seperate from the honor) alot tho not a single key fragment has dropped and my honor lvl has not gone up so i have two questions 

how long does it take for the honor lvl to go up? 
and when will keys actually drop for me cus they havent even once

cus i have seen them say its supose to come out evenly you play alot one day and boom you get rewarded with keys but that aint happening to me

replies.body:
There's no visible meter to check how close you are to leveling Honor, just consistency!  Key fragments should still appear for you just for being honorable, in addition to Honor Capsules.  Per the [Honor Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), these should be dropping as soon as level 2.  You may have to relog if you don't see any in your inventory as well, but keep in mind that it still has limitations like previously (12 per ~30 days).  

I looked into your account and I do see a few fragments dropping for you recently, not including the ones from capsules.  The Let me know if that clears things up!

They also play way less than me.

ok so i have found out the issue, you are right keyfragments have dropped infact a decent amount about 5 but the game has never notified  me about these drops ever so thats what caused my confusion, thanks for the reponse hopefully it will start actually letting me know when keys drop next time
